resources.string:
How to Display Data:
1. Make sure your device is connected to the ToolCase. If not please see previous instructions.
2. The date will then automatically display in the Range Finder and Thermometer pages.
If you encounter issues, restart your app and try again.

TroubleShooting

Data never displays:
If either the Range Finder or thermometer data is not displaying then you want to make sure that you are connected to the ToolCase correctly using the previous instructions and restart your app by fulling closing it and reopening it.
